scenario.name: uas_create_conf_like_cisco

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="<sip:([^;@]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_number"/>
<ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="To:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,local_domain" /> <ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_domain" />

scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK Via:[$inv_via] From:[$inv_from] To:[$inv_to];tag=[$local_tag_call_1] [last_call-id] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Cisco Conf Test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_call_1] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag_call_1] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Cisco Conf Test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=sendonly

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$call2_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_call_2] To: <sip:[$call2_number]@[$call2_sipdomain]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 20000 20000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Cisco Conf Test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$call2_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

REFER sip:[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_conf] To: <sip:[$conf_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] REFER Accept: application/x-cisco-remotecc-response+xml Expires: 60 Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Referred-By: "[$local_number]" <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]> Refer-To: cid:2b4f156a@[$local_domain] Content-Id: <2b4f156a@[$local_domain]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/x-cisco-remotecc-request+xml Content-Disposition: session;handling=required Content-Length: [len]
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <x-cisco-remotecc-request> <softkeyeventmsg> <softkeyevent>Conference</softkeyevent> <dialogid> <callid>[$my_call_id]</callid> <localtag>[$local_tag_call_1]</localtag> <remotetag>[$remote_tag_call_1]</remotetag> </dialogid> <linenumber>0</linenumber> <participantnum>0</participantnum> <consultdialogid> <callid>[$my_call_id]</callid> <localtag>[$local_tag_call_1]</localtag> <remotetag>[$remote_tag_call_1]</remotetag> </consultdialogid> <state>false</state> <joindialogid> <callid></callid> <localtag></localtag> <remotetag></remotetag> </joindialogid> <eventdata> <invocationtype>explicit</invocationtype> </eventdata> <userdata></userdata> <softkeyid>0</softkeyid> <applicationid>0</applicationid> </softkeyeventmsg> </x-cisco-remotecc-request>

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_call_1] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag_call_1] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 10000 10001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Cisco Conf Test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$remote_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_call_1] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$conf_dom]>;tag=[$remote_tag_call_1] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Content-Length: 0

REFER sip:[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_conf] To: <sip:[$conf_dom]> [last_call-id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] REFER Accept: application/x-cisco-remotecc-response+xml Expires: 60 Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Referred-By: "[$local_number]" <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]> Refer-To: cid:2b4f156a@[$local_domain] Content-Id: <2b4f156a@[$local_domain]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/x-cisco-remotecc-request+xml Content-Disposition: session;handling=required Content-Length: [len]
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <x-cisco-remotecc-request> <softkeyeventmsg> <softkeyevent>Conference</softkeyevent> <dialogid> <callid>[$my_call_id]</callid> <localtag>[$local_tag_call_1]</localtag> <remotetag>[$remote_tag_call_1]</remotetag> </dialogid> <linenumber>0</linenumber> <participantnum>0</participantnum> <consultdialogid> <callid>[$my_call_id]</callid> <localtag>[$local_tag_call_2]</localtag> <remotetag>[$remote_tag_call_2]</remotetag> </consultdialogid> <state>false</state> <joindialogid> <callid></callid> <localtag></localtag> <remotetag></remotetag> </joindialogid> <eventdata> <invocationtype>explicit</invocationtype> </eventdata> <userdata></userdata> <softkeyid>0</softkeyid> <applicationid>0</applicationid> </softkeyeventmsg> </x-cisco-remotecc-request>

ACK sip:[$call2_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$call2_number]@[$node_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag_call_2] To: <sip:[$call2_number]@[$call2_sipdomain]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE [authentication] Contact: <sip:[$local_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 30000 30000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Cisco Conf Test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
